ModMetaData.name: CriticalMoods
ModMetaData.author: Gagaro
ModMetaData.description:
Add three critical moods and change after thoughts to avoid moods to snowball too much.
New moods are:
* Looking for trouble: Survivor will attack people he doesn't like. * Animal killing spree: Survivor will only attack animals. * Breaking Spree: Survivor will try to break things around him.
Change to core are:
* Berserk mood is slightly less likely to happen. * Critical mental breaks give "catharsis" afterthought, giving +30 needs * Serious mental breaks give "feeling liberated" afterthought, giving +20 needs * Minor mental breaks give "calmed" afterthought, giving +15 needs
